nas_snapshot_informations: A snapshot is an instantaneous shot. They capture the state of your NAS at the precise moment that the snapshot is taken.
nas_snapshot_informations_size: Warning: Snapshots take up space on your partition to work properly. No logs are kept of snapshots. For the same interval, the latest snapshot deletes the previous one.
